channel.title: os on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in os on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoft’s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoft’s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-18
item.description: The PinePhone Pro brings upgraded hardware to the Linux phone (3 minute read) Pine64 is now taking preorders for the PinePhone Pro, the fastest mainline Linux smartphone on the market.
